Class UpdateQAEvaluationTestingAutomation

java.lang.Object
tests.UpdateQAEvaluationTestingAutomation
public class UpdateQAEvaluationTestingAutomation extends Object

Title: HW3Junit Class.

Description: A Junit testing class that is testing adding and deleting questions and answers from the database.

Copyright: Zachary Chalmers @ 2025

Version:
1.00 2025-03-24 Creating and testing the tests
Author:
Zachary Chalmers

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UpdateQAEvaluationTestingAutomation()
    Default constructor to be used for javaDoc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setup()
    This setup function runs at the beginning of the test and sets up the database, and gets the first question and answer to start the tests on.
    void
    testAddAnswerToQuestion()
    This tests adding a new answer to the question and then verifies the size of the questions related answers to ensure that it was added.
    void
    testDeleteAnswerFromQuestion()
    This tests deleting an answer from a question and then verifies that the size of the question's related answers is 1 less than the old question's related answers.
    void
    testEditQuestionTitle()
    This tests editing a question title and then verifies that the old question title does not equal the new question title.
    void
    testReAddAnswerAfterEdit()
    This tests re-adding a new answer to the question after editing the question title and then verifies that the answer was added to the new question's related answers.
    void
    testUpdateAnswerText()
    This tests updating an answer that is associated with a question and then verifies that the question now contains the new answer with its new text.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • UpdateQAEvaluationTestingAutomation

      public UpdateQAEvaluationTestingAutomation()
      Default constructor to be used for javaDoc

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup() throws SQLException
      This setup function runs at the beginning of the test and sets up the database, and gets the first question and answer to start the tests on. Using the connectToDatabase(), we have it set to populate with test questions and answers.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error when setting up the database.

    • testAddAnswerToQuestion

      public void testAddAnswerToQuestion() throws SQLException
      This tests adding a new answer to the question and then verifies the size of the questions related answers to ensure that it was added.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error when getting the question or answer from the database.

    • testEditQuestionTitle

      public void testEditQuestionTitle() throws SQLException
      This tests editing a question title and then verifies that the old question title does not equal the new question title.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error when getting the question from the database.

    • testDeleteAnswerFromQuestion

      public void testDeleteAnswerFromQuestion() throws SQLException
      This tests deleting an answer from a question and then verifies that the size of the question's related answers is 1 less than the old question's related answers.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error when deleting the answer from the database.

    • testReAddAnswerAfterEdit

      public void testReAddAnswerAfterEdit() throws SQLException
      This tests re-adding a new answer to the question after editing the question title and then verifies that the answer was added to the new question's related answers.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error when getting the question from the database.

    • testUpdateAnswerText

      public void testUpdateAnswerText() throws SQLException
      This tests updating an answer that is associated with a question and then verifies that the question now contains the new answer with its new text.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error when getting the question from the database.
